content.prompt: Celtis’ discussion of Italian influence in the German lands is most similar to which of the following?

choices.label: Machiavelli’s criticism of Italian political systems in The Prince
Galileo’s science-based inquiries that threatened the authority of Catholic worldviews
Erasmus’ arguments in favor of religious toleration and criticizing traditional superstitions
Martin Luther’s criticisms of the Catholic Church in his Ninety-five Theses

skill.text: Skill 5.A: Identify patterns among or connections between historical developments and processes.
